data.title: Celebrating the Harvey Award - University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
data.meta_description: “I would like to say to the Harvey family: thank you...
data.meta_site_name: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill | the Campaign for Carolina
data.text: There are few opportunities for university researchers to be involved in the early stages of intervention. There’s even fewer research grants that focus on the social science side of research, that promote community-university partnerships. But ever since 2007, the Harvey Award has supported innovation and community partnerships in the social sciences at UNC. Here’s a look back at some funded projects, and a peek at some new ones.
